arts.ttl: Wolves vs Everton, Carabao Cup: Preview and Predicted Lineups
arts.sum: The Blues return to cup action to take on Wolves once again at the Molineux Stadium.

arts.ttl: Fresh concern for Wolves' jittery defence as Everton could finally unleash £42m threat
arts.sum: Vitor Pereira says Wolves need a result to lift confidence and he will be hoping his side can get revenge on Everton, who beat them 3-2 in the league earlier this season. Wolves face Everton in the Carabao Cup, looking to get back on track after a poor start to the season.

arts.ttl: ‘We’re Ready’: James Tarkowski Says Toffees Eager for Cup Success Ahead of Wolves Game
arts.sum: Everton captain James Tarkowski has revealed the Toffees’ determination to win a trophy this season. The Blues are without silverware since 1995, a drought that now stretches over three decades. Indeed, a whole generation of Evertonians have grown up without seeing a trophy-winning side, myself included. However, James Tarkowski insists that there is real ambition to finally put an end to this embarrassing chapter in the club’s history. He said: “There’s definitely an emphasis on us doing well in the […] The post ‘We’re Ready’: James Tarkowski Says Toffees Eager for Cup Success Ahead of Wolves Game appeared first on Grand Old Team.

arts.ttl: Three things Wolves must change for Everton clash, including dropping £16m starter
arts.sum: Emmanuel Agbadou has struggled to replicate the form that made him stand out last season, when he immediately impressed Wolves fans with his performances. Wolves’ winless streak continued with a 3-1 defeat against Leeds United, extending a poor run of form that stretches all the way back to the end of last season.

arts.ttl: What can Everton learn from their win against Wolves ahead of the cup rematch?
arts.sum: It was just over three weeks ago that Everton beat Wolves 3-2 away from home in the Premier League, so what can David Moyes and his team learn from that performance ahead of the rematch?

arts.ttl: Wolves vs Everton predictions: Toffees to bounce back from derby loss
arts.sum: Wolves have endured a dismal start to the new Premier League season and Alex Jack expects their fortunes to worsen when Everton head to Molineux for an EFL Cup third round tie.

arts.ttl: Wolves vs Everton - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Tuesday's EFL Cup clash between Wolverhampton Wanderers and Everton, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
